about_the_game:
Welcome to the Neon Drifters Arcade!


Embark on a thrilling journey of speed, style, and neon-lit adrenaline in PolyDrift, the ultimate arcade-style drift racing experience! Master precision sliding, conquer challenging tracks, and dominate the global leaderboard in this electrifying homage to the art of drift.

Key Features:


🚗 Intuitive Controls: Experience the joy of effortless control as you glide through the neon-lit landscapes with unparalleled ease. The arcade-style controls make drifting a breeze, allowing you to focus on perfecting your technique and chasing high scores.




🎯 Multiply your score: Strategize and maximize your drift scores. Hit targets, maintain precision slides, and chain together epic drifts to skyrocket your score to new heights. The decision is yours to focus on multipliers from the start or take it as they come. But do not lose your drift!




🔵 Bonus Points: Master the art of precision drifting to activate bonus points and boost your score, synergizing with multipliers for maximum leaderboard domination.




🏆 Leaderboards: Compete against your steam friends or players from around the world and stake your claim to drift glory on leaderboards. Climb the ranks, earn bragging rights, and prove your skills as the ultimate drift champion.

PolyDrift - Where Speed Meets Style, and Neon Reigns Supreme.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD 5 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Prepare to immerse yourself in the neon-soaked world of drift racing mastery. Customize your ride, perfect your technique, and chase the ultimate thrill of the drift. The leaderboard awaits - will you rise to the challenge and claim your place among the elite?
